Package com.example.ihuntwithjavalins.QRCode

Class QRCodeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.ihuntwithjavalins.QRCode.QRCodeController
  • public class QRCodeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for QRCode related operations Manages the QR codes provides methods to get and sort user QR codes Design patterns: none

        public void overwriteCode​(QRCode code,
                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> dataMap,
                          OnCompleteListener<QRCode> listener)
        Overwrites(and creates new) QRCode document based on given data map
        Parameters:
        code - the QRCode to overwrite
        dataMap - the data field map to overwrite the QRCode data with
        listener - the listener to call after overwriting
